name: Initiative Tracker for D&D
description:
Track your games initiative in a friendly and clean environment!
Although built around Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition, the majority of the features can work with every d20-system game.

Featuring:
- Simple sheet for initiative needs
- Advanced mode with HP, AC and Passive Perception
- Quick edit with gestures
- Personalization options with images, level / challenge rating , grouping, factions
- Support for static initiative, mass rerolls and dynamic battles
- Multiple factions encounters
- Simple monster library for D&D 5th Edition quick reference
- Create saved groups and encounters from current battle or from scratch to track your campaign
- Monster images: creatures in "enemies" faction will automatically search the net for appropriate images and display them in battle or in groups. (Requires internet connection and Lollipop+ device)

Getting the premium version will help further development of this app and you will also gain the following features:
- Add monsters to the battle or to groups directly from the monster library
- Add saved groups to the current battle
- Backup and import your saved groups
- Encounter Difficulty Calculator 5e: evaluate battle using heroes levels and monsters numbers / cr, showing encounter difficulty and xp (only for D&D 5th Edition)


This app will work with any d20-system game including: D&D (any, but tailored for 5th Edition), Pathfinder, Call of Cthulhu, D20Modern, Lone Wolf, Conan, Spycraft, Star Wars
